title: The Australian eye I
creator_credit: David Muir, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: Each film examines in detail one master work in the Art Gallery of N.S.W’s collection, drawing upon related material such as preliminary sketches and studies, and also upon writings or other records which throw light on its creation.
